1.title: Shi Zhengrong

episode of.title: Portraits: China - Profiling the Chinese Dream (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Just 10 years ago Shi Zhengrong was a part-time chef in an Australian diner. Today, he is one of China's wealthiest men, owner of a solar panel enterprise that is pegged to rival today's oil conglomerates. In this episode, we unveil the journey of China's modern day scientist, entrepreneur and environmental hero, Dr. Shi.
